venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
Click on www.buywithme.com for a $29 ticket by 5/21 for either the 1PM or 6PM Tasting Session.

TIME:1pm - 5pm, hosted by Lauren & Kirk


LOCATION: Cyclorama, Boston Center For The Arts

ADDRESS: 539 Tremont Street, Boston 02116

Celebrate Spring and taste wines of the world. Guests will be given a "passport" (event layout) to travel to different regions around the world and taste wines from each. Meet your "Travel Guide", Lauren, just inside the main entrance wearing a "safari hat" and holding a Meetup sign.

Evening guests will also enjoy great music.

All guests will be entered to win great items valued at over $1000

Saturday Tasting (1pm - 5pm) - includes general admission for the event.


This is an interactive social event geared towards young professionals 20s, 30s, and 40s

There will be very limited to no seating provided.

Each guest will receive a passport (map) allowing travel to each wine region.

The passport will guide you around the room to visit different region and try

their offerings. SAFE TRAVELS!!!

This is a joint meetup with members of "Social Fun"
item.name: Spring Wine Festival 2010
